bug.author: yangsiyu007
bug.summary: Code snippets in Remarks section not formatted correctly
bug.description:
In the Remarks section of (<denchmark-link:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azureml-core/azureml.data.abstract_dataset.abstractdataset?view=azure-ml-py#as-named-input-name->https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azureml-core/azureml.data.abstract_dataset.abstractdataset?view=azure-ml-py#as-named-input-name-</denchmark-link> ), the two code snippets are not formatted correctly. There's a sentence that should not be a part of the code snippet in the first one, and extra ``` in the second one. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Document Details</denchmark-h>
⚠ Do not edit this section. It is required for docs.microsoft.com ➟ GitHub issue linking.
ID: 06be0567-a5f7-21d0-6dac-8edeefe68980 Version Independent ID: 4c06aaf8-fce2-6df2-0386-51a7472957fb Content: azureml.data.abstract_dataset.AbstractDataset class - Azure Machine Learning Python Content Source: AzureML-Docset/stable/docs-ref-autogen/azureml-core/azureml.data.abstract_dataset.AbstractDataset.yml Service: machine-learning Sub-service: core GitHub Login: @DebFro Microsoft Alias: debfro

comments.comment: Thank you for the feedback. We will track it as bug in our documentation and fix in the next few SDK release
we did the investigation but it's a bug in documentation generation instead of our source code.
